sentences.en: He could not expunge the incident from his memory.
Remember that you can expunge anything you find undesirable.
sentences.cn: 记住,你可以除去任何你发现令你讨厌的东西.

sentences.en: Remember that you can expunge anything you find undesirable. You need only the will.
sentences.cn: 记住,你可以除去任何你发现令你讨厌的东西. 你只需要有决心.

sentences.en: The experience was something he had tried to expunge from his memory.
sentences.cn: 他曾努力将那段经历从记忆中抹去。

sentences.en: The juvenile court may expunge or destroy the records a juvenile at any time.
sentences.cn: 少年法庭可在任何时候删除是销毁未成年人的法庭判决记录.

sentences.en: The juvenile court may expunge or destroy the records of a juvenile at any time.
sentences.cn: 少年法庭可在任何时候删除或者销毁未成年人的记录.
革命者清洗了国内反对派。

sentences.en: Wonder when to expunge that kitchen sponge from your life?
sentences.cn: 你对何时换掉厨房里的海绵有疑问?

trans.tran_en: to remove a name from a list, piece of information, or book
